name: English - Myanmar Dictionary
description: * English - Myanmar Dictionary is an English to Myanmar offline dictionary. This dictionary provides dictionary and synonyms results and also provides voice, bookmarks, recent features.   * This dictionary contains few sample pictures for some definitions. To using this dictionary you no need to pay any charges.  - With 21984 words definitions - Images - 933 - Synonym - Word link - Wildcard search support  * Example: w*me => start with w and end with me w?ll => start with w, any one character and end with ll
